title: | International Mathematical Union (IMU)
snippet: ICM 2026 Program Committee Chair Claire Voisin (CNRS, Institut de Mathématiques de Jussieu-Paris Rive Gauche) has been awarded the Crafoord Prize in Mathematics 2024 by the Royal Swedish Academy of Sciences. You can watch the prize video on YouTube. The Mathematical Congress of the Americas ...

title: ICM 2026 - International Congress of Mathematicians in Philadelphia
snippet: The ICM Structure Committee for ICM 2026 was constituted in late 2022 with Terence Tao continuing as Chair. It issued a report regarding the ICM 2026 scientific program in October 2023. In August 2025, Martin Hairer assumed the role of Chair, with Terence Tao continuing as a regular member-at-large.

title: IMU Executive Committee | International Mathematical Union Leadership 2023-2026
snippet: Meet the IMU Executive Committee members leading the International Mathematical Union for 2023-2026. Learn about their roles and bios.

title: International Mathematical Union - Wikipedia
snippet: The International Mathematical Union (IMU) is an international organization devoted to international cooperation in the field of mathematics across the world. It is a member of the International Science Council (ISC) and supports the International Congress of Mathematicians (ICM).
